MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA10 postcode area of St Helens, affecting properties in Peter Street, Lyon Close and surrounding streets. We now expect your supply to be restored by 4AM. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.14AM on 3rd February 2021.
